channel.title: Sound. Music. Yeah.
channel.description:
What equipment / software do you [teh devs] use for recording sounds, music tracks, voice, and everything audio related? I'm interested and have a friend in the biz who is impressed with your work... I didn't tell him where the music came from :stuck_out_tongue: Imma get him some audio stuff for his birthday.
Thankya

item.title: Sound. Music. Yeah.
item.dc:creator: LimitBreak
item.description:
waqwarrior:

What equipment / software do you [teh devs] use for recording sounds, music tracks, voice, and everything audio related? I’m interested and have a friend in the biz who is impressed with your work… I didn’t tell him where the music came from Imma get him some audio stuff for his birthday.

You could have used the Ask the Devs thread to ask your question, no actual need to make a new thread.
